title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.9 - Encouragement of outpatient services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.9 - Encouragement of outpatient services

State Regulations

Patients who leave without notice and are subsequently
located but not returned to the facility should be encouraged to accept
outpatient services in accordance with Part 36 of this Title, and their status
should be changed and reported accordingly. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
37.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
